Type.Name: ImageClickEventHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ImageClickEventHandler(object sender, ImageClickEventArgs e);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: This delegate defines the required signature for all click events raised when a user clicks an image-based ASP.NET server control. You must use the signature defined by this delegate for any OnServerClick event handlers that you create for an server control or any OnClick event handlers that you create for an Web server control.
If you create a custom image-based ASP.NET server control that users can click, use this delegate to define the events associated with that user action.
For more information about delegates and how they interact with events, see Events and Delegates. For information about how to raise events, see Raising an Event.

summary.para: Represents the method that handles any events that are raised when a user clicks an image-based ASP.NET server control.
